segments.text: Mr . Drake , I'm pleased to do business with your company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're glad to be able to offer our services to your business , Mrs . Wayne .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your company is very well respected . About how long have you been in business ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Almost twenty years . We were the first total PR services company of our kind in California .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And this is your company's head office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , yes , but now we have six offices in California alone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's wonderful . Isn't your company part of ARE Corporation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . We are their sole PR sector business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not bad . How long have you been in PR ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not long actually . So I'm sure I will learn a lot from our cooperation .
segments.speaker: S2
